Text.Page:
Even today, the citizens of our federation are traded as slaves in the Rain Cages. We can't let the Kazuur Syndicate prey on our people!

Gather your allies and strike at the {@LinkCreature:12#17#Red Lash marauders}. They're the syndicate's enforcers.

With the slaver threat ended and the pirates disrupted, the region can start contributing to the war effort.

Our people feel safer than they have since the war started. I know the nagas and gulas are still out there, but you showed us they aren't unbeatable foes.

We can win this thing! The federation's promise is as ironclad as ever!
